sprunki-infected.title: Sprunki Infected
sprunki-infected.description: Dive into the world of Sprunki Infected, a captivating puzzle game where time is your biggest enemy. Navigate through challenging levels, collecting healthy Sprunkies, and eliminating the infected ones. With fast-paced and addictive gameplay, Sprunki Infected offers an unparalleled gaming experience.

HomeIframe.title: Play Sprunki Infected Now!
HomeIframe.description: Control the mischievous Sprunki in a vibrant and dynamic universe. Use your wits and skills to solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and finish each level before time runs out.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Sprunki Infected is a unique puzzle game that challenges players to gather healthy Sprunkies while avoiding or defeating infected ones. Navigate through intricate levels, each more challenging than the last.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Control Sprunki using the mouse or keyboard to move in all directions.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Collect healthy Sprunkies scattered throughout the levels to boost your score.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Jump on infected Sprunkies to eliminate them and advance.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Navigate through levels that test your reflexes and problem-solving abilities.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Race against the clock to collect and conquer before time expires.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Immerse yourself in vibrant visuals that set the stage for endless fun.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Experience engaging, fast-paced action that keeps you coming back.
